author: timbeiko
content: FYI we've just renamed this channel to <#692078615269212180> to use it in a slightly more general way than just the "fee market". That said, we can still discuss anything related to fee markets here ðŸ™‚

author: barnabemonnot
content: Hi! The intent of this channel is indeed to explore research questions around blockspace and block construction. Fee markets are a critical component, but blockspace is more general, encompassing the various actors involved in receiving, ordering, executing or settling end-user transactions. The content of this channel is expected to differ from <#874767108809031740> in that we seek to take a more abstract view of the question, rather than look into the implementation of these ideas, however we expect some overlap and synergies between the two ðŸ™‚
